channel.title: Rate my site
channel.description:
I've had it for about 2 or 3 weeks now, haven't had much time to work on it though as I've been to busy with life :(.
http://jarod.b.angelfire.com/ is teh link, dink dink.
UHH, atm I donno wtf is going on with anglefire. But BI's? Wtf... And for those who use IE will be crippled by site, its looks waaaayyyyyyy better in firefox.

item.title: Rate my site
item.dc:creator: @Peter787 Peter787
item.description:
@Peter787 wrote:

pretty fail site…
[center] Rather then simply stating it fails, why not tell him why? It gives him the opportunity to fix what is wrong with it, rather then simply stating a useless point. So please, think before you post. [/center]

item.title: Rate my site
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:16, topic:244169”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=320537.msg2544446#msg2544446 date=1227199953]

It actually looks pretty good, just using the basic techniques. As much as this really doesn’t relate to the programming of the site at all, I suggest buying a real domain ($10 max for a year) to get rid of those ads, as they make it less attractive.

Overall, a good, solid effort.
[/quote]Who would have to get hosting on top of that lul.

He could likely find free hosting somewhere, it’s better then what he’s got. :)[/quote]That is very true xD

Hard to find good freehosting w/o ads too, though.
I wonder if nationvoice still does free webhosting.

Edit: http://webhosting.nationvoice.com/clients/signup.php

yerp

Read full topic

item.title: Rate my site
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Nice website. I agree with Pwnd. It’s easy to use and displays well. And I don’t see any ads! ( yay firefox + adblock plus ) Of course, you can add more to it, but this is a very good beginning.

My only critique is that the portfolio links do not work and there are not any margins around the images on your About page. Also, try making the text justified to see if it looks better.

Hope to see more.

Read full topic

item.title: Rate my site
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

I like it. It’s easy to use and looks good. The ads aren’t your fault.

item.title: Rate my site
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

I made this webpage 90% basic, lol. Currently I’m learning Javascript if you haven’t noticed. As soon as I learn that my site is gonna be the bomb! XD, Tizag are ftw tutorials.

Greeny:

How much of it did you actually make?

… What kind of question is that by the way?[quote=“Greeny, post:8, topic:244169”]He thinks webpages are art. Lol’d[/quote]

XD, you forgot that gimp is helpful ftw (for me) when it comes to designing things.[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:7, topic:244169”]He’s black.

But it doesn’t look bad, but then again, what do I know?[/quote]
What does black have to do with this topic?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 19, 2008, 04:01:48 pm[/size][hr][quote=“umair, post:4, topic:244169”]Extreamly basic site but then again good effort.[/quote]

Spell extremely the basic way :p. And yeah, I could’ve made a better site if I wanted but I don’t want to at the moment.

Read full topic
